title: Magic's Guardian
description: In Magics Guardian Life will never be the same for soldiers of fortune, McIvor Mac Docherty and his buddy Angus Striker McDonough. Trapped in a cave system after a lost battle, the two men find their fate tied to Ch'dwen of Ard'win, Guardian to the King of Elves. In a race to save kidnapped Queen Shad, Mac and Striker will learn the truth of Strikers own existence and the meaning of true magic. Magic and lore come alive as Guardians and Soldiers join with their spirit animals to ride across Egypt into the Northern Continent in search of a traitor, dragons and lost love.
author: Barbara  Mason
